product.descripcion:
Diseño: Cuentan con una parte superior de piel sintética con un pronunciado estampado de vaca en tonos blanco roto y marrón oscuro/negro. [1.5, 1.8, 1.15]

results.angle_name: Tendencia ‘cowboycore’ y edición con estampado vaca + forro rosa (look viral)
results.buyer_persona: Mujer 18–30 fashion/IG-TikTok; amantes de tendencias y animal print

ad_copy.title: ¡Luce el estilo ‘cowboycore’ 2023!
ad_copy.primary_text: Transforma tu outfit con el Samba ‘vaca’. ¡Sé parte de la tendencia!
ad_copy.description: Atrévete a destacar, disponible solo por tiempo limitado.

beats.visual: Close-up of Samba shoes on grass. Bright colors. High contrast.
Model walking confidently; slow motion spin.
beats.rhythm_editing: Slow motion with rhythmic music beat.
beats.sfx_music: Snappy tune with distinct beat changes.

beats.visual: Model with friends laughing; city background.
Close-up showing pink lining and pattern.
Multiple outfits and settings montage.
Text overlaid on dynamic cityscape.
Call-to-action pop-up; product shelf close-up.
beats.rhythm_editing: Closing punch with direct music stop.
beats.cta: Compra hoy y destaca con Samba.

production_notes: Begin with a vibrant close-up of the shoes in nature setting.
Use slow motion to highlight movement; model spins to showcase shoes.
Ensure colors pop, especially during close-ups of the pink lining.
Music should be upbeat and aligned with cuts to maintain energy.
Integrate dynamic transitions to emphasize fashion vibe.
Focus on urban locations to contrast the ‘cowboycore’ theme.
Incorporate user-generated styled outfits for authenticity.
Add text overlays to complement visuals thanks to sound-off viewing.
Use colorful settings to enhance visual appeal and brand warmth.

hooks_used: "¿Cuál es tu mayor reto en ___? ¡Aquí te contamos cómo vencerlo!"
"Descubre qué hace de ___ una elección indispensable para los compradores inteligentes."
"Las personas no pueden creer sus ojos después de usar ___. ¡Pruébalo!"
"Vive una experiencia única con ___. ¡No te lo pierdas!"
compliance_notes: No specific claims about product availability or pricing beyond known details.
Ensured no exaggerated promises beyond provided promotional claims.
Maintained language appropriate for the target audience's age group.
Avoided any statements that could be viewed as exclusionary or non-inclusive.

results.angle_name: Precio-valor accesible vs. retail oficial de Sambas en Colombia
results.buyer_persona: Jóvenes 16–34 que quieren el look Samba sin pagar >600k

ad_copy.title: ¡El look Samba por menos de 150k!
ad_copy.primary_text: Consigue el estilo del momento sin vaciar tu bolsillo. ¡Calidad y estilo a solo $140.000!
ad_copy.description: No pagues más de 600k, descubre lo que todos quieren.

structure_rules.cadence_rule: 3-3-3: cada 3 segundos debe cambiar al menos 2 aspectos

beats.visual: Close-up of shoes with dynamic pop-up text
beats.voiceover: Looking for Samba style without the high price?

beats.visual: Comparison of retail vs. discounted price overlaid on visuals
beats.voiceover: Why pay more than 600k when you can have this?

beats.visual: Hands feeling the shoe material
beats.voiceover: Quality you can feel and trust.

beats.visual: Youth enjoying the shoes while walking
beats.voiceover: Stay comfortable and stylish wherever you go.

beats.visual: Group of smiling young people showing their shoes
beats.rhythm_editing: Slowed down frame with music crescendo

beats.visual: Highlight location map with pinpoint
beats.voiceover: Exclusive local offer you can't miss.

beats.visual: Call to action screen with product and price
beats.voiceover: Get your pair today for just $140,000.

production_notes: Start with a bold pop-up text in large, bold font.
Use split screen for price comparison in Beat 2.
Employ lively colors to maintain engagement.
Incorporate product close-up shots that highlight textures.
Use dynamic transitions to keep the flow fluid.
Maintain music consistency with tempo adjustments.
Highlight product details with slow-motion cuts.
Showcase real users for authenticity.
Include captions to reinforce voiceover messages for sound-off viewers.
End with a strong call to action and price display.
Ensure rhythm aligns with transitions to build urgency.
Incorporate youthful, energetic visuals throughout.
Opt for high contrast in visuals for a striking effect.

hooks_used: "What's your biggest obstacle in achieving the stylish look of Sambas? Here's how to conquer it."
"Imagine yourself with the Samba look for less than 150k, what difference would it make?"
"See what makes Samba shoes a must-have for savvy shoppers seeking value."
"Your week deserves a style upgrade! Treat yourself to Sambas."
"How would it feel to finally get Sambas without breaking the bank? Find out today!"
compliance_notes: Ensure no explicit claims of exclusivity beyond product availability in Colombia.
Avoid stating exact comparison pricing without market references.
Present offer timing as 'according to availability'.
Maintain clarity around guarantee terms as '10 days'.

results.angle_name: Versatilidad para outfits: contraste blanco/negro + acentos rosa
results.buyer_persona: Mujeres que combinan básicos (denim, faldas, vestidos) con un toque statement

ad_copy.title: Transforma tu look en segundos
ad_copy.primary_text: Dale vida a tus básicos con Samba Og Vaca. Un toque audaz sin complicaciones.
ad_copy.description: Redescubre tus outfits con estilo y comodidad sin límites.

structure_rules.change_definition: change two of visual, text, or rhythm every 3 seconds

beats.visual: Close-up shot of Samba Og Vaca sneakers against a plain background, gradually zooming out.
beats.transition: Quick zoom transition into next scene

beats.on_screen_text: Samba Og Vaca: El toque audaz.
beats.visual: Model wearing Samba Og Vaca with a plain denim outfit, taking a step forward.
beats.voiceover: Añade un toque audaz con estilo...

beats.visual: Split screen: Left shows a skirt, right a dress, both paired with the shoes.
Close-up of pink accents on the shoes with a quick rotation.
beats.voiceover: ...gracias a esos acentos rosa. ¡Ideal para cualquier look!

beats.visual: Model lounging comfortably while wearing the shoes.
Model walking confidently in the street, smiling.

beats.on_screen_text: Descubre Samba Og Vaca: ¡Tu look, elevado!
beats.visual: Close-up shot of the shoes as someone ties the laces.
beats.voiceover: Transforma tu look con Samba Og Vaca.

production_notes: Use high contrast for text overlays to ensure readability against dynamic visuals.
Ensure each outfit change is swift yet clear, focusing on how the shoes complement each look.
Maintain a consistent color grading to highlight the white, black, and pink tones.
Capture footage in natural light to enhance the textures and details of the shoes.
Incorporate UGC-style clips for authenticity in casual settings.
Focus on smooth, dynamic camera movements to keep viewer interest.
Emphasize the product's details in beat 4 to highlight the design elements.
Highlight the versatility of the product through multiple quick outfit changes.

compliance_notes: All visuals should accurately represent the product's design and colors.
Ensure no exaggerated claims are made about durability or functionality. Maintain focus on styling versatility.
Include the warranty as mentioned in the product description. Avoid any additional claims about the product not provided in the input.
Verify that the sequence follows copyright and platform community guidelines.
